actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.

actions.subcommittee: Department Operations, Oversight, Nutrition and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Department Operations, Oversight, Nutrition and Forestry.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Department Operations, Oversight, Nutrition, and Forestry

official_title: To provide for the conveyance of the National Forest System lands underlying the George Kirkpatrick Dam on the Ocklawaha River near Palatka, Florida, and related lands to the State of Florida.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to convey to the State of Florida: (1) National Forest System lands underlying the George Kirkpatrick Dam on the Ocklawaha River near Palatka, Florida; (2) National Forest System lands laying below the 21-feet National Geodetic Vertical Datum underlying the Rodman Reservoir formed by such dam; and (3) National Forest tract #C-615. Conditions such conveyance on the State agreeing to assume responsibility for environmental remediation activities.

titles.title: To provide for the conveyance of the National Forest System lands underlying the George Kirkpatrick Dam on the Ocklawaha River near Palatka, Florida, and related lands to the State of Florida.
